QuestData.Title: Shaking Our Foundations
QuestData.Description:
Djaradin stonebinders are threatening to break the very foundations of the Citadel! They have to be stopped!
We haven't even had a chance to reclaim the Citadel as our own and yet it might crumble beneath us. We can't let that happen.
Do what you can, $n... by that I mean kill them!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Along with Stonewreacker Tokara, Molka is a skilled manipulator of the hard obsidian stone beneath the citadel.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Stonewrecker Tokara, Molka the Grinder, and the elementals they have unleashed.
